name: The Alchemist's Vessel
description:
The Alchemist's Vessel is a puzzle game set in a Steampunk world where you control two automats: Bulky and Agile. Use their different abilities to interact with the environment and reach places to activate different mechanisms while you switch between them.

Bulky is a heavy automat that can move objects of the world as needed. The only problem is that He can't jump so he has problems reaching heights or activating some mechanisms like levers.

Agile is a more speedy automat that can jump and move using metallic objects that Bulky moves around, use him to reach those tricky places! 

FEATURES

  • 20+ puzzles to break your mind while solving them
  • 5 different mechanisms like magnets, electric plates, lifts, and extendable plates.
  • Two different characters with 2 different abilities. Switch between them!
  • Dark Steampunk world to discover and enjoy.
  • 4 different zones with different aesthetics. From an old mansion to a dark lab.
